attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that it`s unfair& unjust for the MOD to give a typing clerk nearly £500.000 for a strain to their finger when we as Soldiers served and are receiving No pension at all for our service I think that it should be looked into imediately,and give us our pensions we deserve

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
